info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, Queens, Bronx, Kings and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 648 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brooklyn Heights, or near Crown Heights, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jersey City, Jamaica, Flatbush, Flushing, Bayonne, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont, Coney Island, Secaucus, Great Neck, Crown Heights, Throgs Neck Bridge, Midtown Manhattan and RFK Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.
